item.description: Anyone want to Disc Golf? I haven't ever done this but, I heard it wias really fun! Here's the directions-From the North-Take I-290 West-I-395. Take exit 4B West to Oxford Center. Cross Rt.12-continue straight on to Charlton St. about 2 miles. Take a left onto Buffum Dam Rd. Follow Dam Rd. to Ranger Station. 1st tee is behind restrooms. From South-Take I-395-exit 4B West to Oxford Center-cross over Rt. 12. Continue straight to Charlton St. about 2 miles. Take a left onto Buffum Dam Rd. Follow Dam Rd. to Ranger Station.-Wear sneakers-Bring lots of fluids-Kate has enough equipment for 8 women. Please try not to do maybe's on this so we have a count. If you have any questions call Kate-508-471-8827. After 18 holes the option to go out and eat is open! Lots of parking-There is no fee on this course.
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for a bunch of dykes in sneakers!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Disc Golf
